decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1835 1B received on 27 August 2015 and 2 and 3 received on 6 July 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for restaurant (A3) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times: 09.00 - 22.30hours Monday - Sunday, Public and Bank Holidays
	All customers shall have vacated the premises within 30 minutes of the above closing times.

Condition : 4 - The premises shall be used as  a restaurant and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class A3, A4 or A5 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 5 - No amplified or live music shall be played within the premises in such a way that would be audible within neighbouring residential properties.

Condition : 6 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for control of fumes and odours including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing.
description: Change of use from  A1 (retail) to A3 (restaurant) with installation of new shop front, erection of single storey rear extension and external extraction flue
